PageWidgetPortable.Title: Realizadas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PR_TAREFAAPONTAMENTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.APONTAMENTO IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOAPONTAMENTOS B WHERE B.STATUS=2)) AND (A.ORDEMPRODUCAOTAREFA = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1845_at2003_hsde792a89.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Tarefas previstas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PR_TAREFAAPONTAMENTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.APONTAMENTO IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOAPONTAMENTOS B WHERE B.STATUS IN (1,3))) AND (A.ORDEMPRODUCAOTAREFA = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1845_at2002_hs5c56ef00.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
